docs.snippet: JACOBSON--Dorothy Ruth, 92, of Palisades, NY formerly of Bayside, NY and Boynton Beach, FL, passed away peacefully on October 1, 2015. Wife of Hirsh Jacobson for 72 years, mother of Carl (Patricia) and Andrew (Shirley). Dorothy is survived by four...
docs.lead_paragraph:
JACOBSON--Dorothy Ruth,

92, of Palisades, NY formerly of Bayside, NY and Boynton Beach, FL, passed away peacefully on October 1, 2015. Wife of Hirsh Jacobson for 72 years, mother of Carl (Patricia) and Andrew (Shirley). Dorothy is survived by four grandchildren, Erik (Alison), Nora (William), Keith (Jennifer), and Claire and five great-grandchildren, Thomas, Olivia, Paul, Alexander and William, and many nieces and nephews. Memorial service to be held Wednesday, October 7, 2015, 1pm, at Higgins Funeral Home, New City, NY.

docs.snippet: HELLER--Elaine Newman, age 89, passed away peacefully at home. She is surviv- ed by her devoted son Lloyd, daughter-in-law Cathy, grandchildren Amy Shapiro (Ethan), Maggie Greebel (Rory), and Adam Heller (Danielle), and five great-grandchildren. P...
docs.lead_paragraph:
HELLER--Elaine Newman,

age 89, passed away peacefully at home. She is surviv- ed by her devoted son Lloyd, daughter-in-law Cathy, grandchildren Amy Shapiro (Ethan), Maggie Greebel (Rory), and Adam Heller (Danielle), and five great-grandchildren. Pre-deceased by son Bruce and husband Herbert. May her memory be a blessing. Gifts in her memory may be made to Hebrew Union College, especially the Debbie Friedman School of Sacred Music at: www.huc.edu

docs.snippet: KARLINSKY--Bette S. (nee Solomon), died peacefully in her sleep September 30, 2015, at age 88 in Boca Raton, Florida. Formerly of New York City, New York; Roslyn, Long Island; and Montreal, Canada, she is survived by son Martin (Christine Ruppert)...
docs.lead_paragraph:
KARLINSKY--Bette S. (nee

Solomon), died peacefully in her sleep September 30, 2015, at age 88 in Boca Raton, Florida. Formerly of New York City, New York; Roslyn, Long Island; and Montreal, Canada, she is survived by son Martin (Christine Ruppert), and daughters Debi (Kathy Rocklen) and Joanna (Justine Berkeley). She was pre-deceased by her dear husband Raymond, and so many good friends and relatives. There was never a person or a dog she did not have all the time in the world to help. Her love stays with us. At her express wish, no memorial and no donations.

headline.main: U.N. to Hold Off on Separate Afghan Bombing Probe for Now
headline.print_headline: U.N. to Hold Off on Separate Afghan Bombing Probe for Now

docs.snippet: The United Nations said on Monday it would wait for the results of U.S., NATO and Afghan investigations into a deadly air strike on a Medecins Sans Frontieres (MSF) hospital in Afghanistan before deciding whether to support an independent probe....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations said on Monday it would wait for the results of U.S., NATO and Afghan investigations into a deadly air strike on a Medecins Sans Frontieres (MSF) hospital in Afghanistan before deciding whether to support an independent probe.

headline.main: Renewables to Struggle to Replace Fossil Fuels-Shell CEO
headline.print_headline: Renewables to Struggle to Replace Fossil Fuels-Shell CEO

docs.snippet: Clean renewable energy will struggle to replace fossil fuels as heavy industries will only gradually wean themselves off coal, oil and gas, Royal Dutch Shell Chief Executive Officer Ben van Beurden is set to say on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clean renewable energy will struggle to replace fossil fuels as heavy industries will only gradually wean themselves off coal, oil and gas, Royal Dutch Shell Chief Executive Officer Ben van Beurden is set to say on Tuesday.

headline.main: Son of a Trump: Mexican comedians hit back in insult-laden show
headline.sub: Son of a Trump: Mexican comedians hit back in insult-laden show

docs.snippet: Mexico's most popular comedians are lambasting U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump in a new play. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico's most popular comedians are lambasting U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump in a new play. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.main: Arkansas: Deal With Inmates Over Drug Secrecy Not a Contract
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Deal With Inmates Over Drug Secrecy Not a Contract

docs.snippet: An agreement to tell Arkansas' condemned inmates the source of its execution drugs isn't technically a contract and a judge should dismiss a lawsuit challenging a new death penalty law, the state's prison director said in a court filing Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An agreement to tell Arkansas' condemned inmates the source of its execution drugs isn't technically a contract and a judge should dismiss a lawsuit challenging a new death penalty law, the state's prison director said in a court filing Monday.

headline.main: University of Texas Debates Guns on Campus After Oregon Shooting
headline.print_headline: University of Texas Debates Guns on Campus After Oregon Shooting

docs.snippet: A law to allow guns in more places at the University of Texas system would increase the danger on campuses and could not prevent mass killings like the one last week in Oregon, faculty and students told a forum on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A law to allow guns in more places at the University of Texas system would increase the danger on campuses and could not prevent mass killings like the one last week in Oregon, faculty and students told a forum on Monday.
